dict.string:
Workout A
Squat - 5x5 Bench Press - 5x5 Barbell Row - 5x5
Workout B
Squat - 5x5 Overhead Press - 5x5 Deadlift - 1x5
Instructions:
3 days per week. Rest between each day. Switch each week from ABA to BAB.

Monday (Heavy)
Squat - 3x6 Deadlift - 2x6 Leg Press - 3x8 - 12 Hamstring Curls - 3x8 - 12
Tuesday (Heavy)
Bench Press - 3x6 Dumbbell Row - 3x6 Overhead Press - 1x6 Lat Pulldown - 1x6 Face Pulls - 3x8 - 12 Close Grip Bench Press - 3x8 - 12
Thursday (Control)
Pause Squat - 6x4 Pause Deadlift - 3x4 Hamstring Curls - 3x8 - 12 Single-leg Leg Press - 3x8 - 12
Friday (Control)
Spoto Press - 6x4 Pause Weighted Pull-up - 6x4 Seated DB Press - 1x10 Dumbbell Row - 1x10 Lateral Raise - 3x8 - 12 DB Bicep Curl - 3x8 - 12
Instructions:
4 days per week. Rest on Wednesday and Weekends.

Monday
Overhead Press - sets of 5/3/1 Overhead Press - 5x10 Lat Work - 5x10
Tuesday
Deadlift - sets of 5/3/1 Deadlift - 5x10 Abs - 5 sets
Thursday
Bench Press - sets of 5/3/1 Bench Press - 5x10 Lat Work - 5x10
Friday
Squat - sets of 5/3/1 Squat - 5x10 Abs - 5 sets
Instructions:
4 days per week. Rest on Wednesday and Weekends.

Workout A
Squat - 5x5 Bench Press - 5x5 Bentover Row 5x5 Barbell Shrugs - 3x8 Tricep Extensions - 3x8 Straight Bar Curls - 3x8 Hyperextensions - 2x10 Cable Crunches - 3x10
Workout B
Squat - 5x5 Deadlift - 1x5 Overhead Press 5x5 Close Grip Bench Press - 3x8 Incline Curls - 3x8 Cable Crunches - 3x10
Instructions:
3 days per week. Rest between each day. Switch each week from ABA to BAB.

Monday
Bench or Press (A/B) - 2x5, 1x5+ Curl - 2x10 - 15 (Bench days) Squat - 2x5, 1x5+ Neck Harness
Wednesday
Bench or Press 2x5, 1x5+ Weighted Chins - 2x6 - 8 Deadlift - 1x5+ Neck Harness
Friday
Bench or Press (A/B) - 2x5, 1x5+ Curl - 2x10 - 15 (Bench days) Squat - 2x5, 1x5+ Neck Harness
Instructions:
3 days per week. Rest between each day.
